channel.title: 614, some help
channel.description:
I am working on a 614 (rune-extreme source) and I want to add a system where you can spawn items for cash.
I might be able to figure it out, but it'll help if someone can give a me a guide
I'm pretty sure if I can add spawn items for cash, I can add selling them back aswell!
Thanks!
